snippet: As they travel the city and country this season, the boys of the New Renaissance Basketball Association, which has had several members directly involved in shootings, will wear anti-violence patches.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column highlights efforts on part of New York-based New Renaissance Basketball Assn to promote awareness of epidemic of gun violence by including orange patch on jerseys worn by players on association's basketball teams; notes idea of orange patch was created by teenagers in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: As they travel the city and country this season, the boys of the New Renaissance Basketball Association, which has had several members directly involved in shootings, will wear anti-violence patches.

headline.print_headline: Amid Gun Violence, Players Will Flash Orange Patches of Protest
headline.main: Amid Gun Violence, Basketball Uniforms Flash Orange Patches of Protest
